body:
Hey guys, after seeing vladthegreat100 make a channel trailer, I've decided to make one as well! The editing took me a while, but I think that it turned out nicely. :)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2Mh-2pkb8k

Make sure to subscribe if you aren't already, thanks!
Have a great day. :)
